game.name: Haparoot
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into a dream world. Become the sole source of light in the darkness and Explore an authentic handcrafted landscape in third-person. Solve layered environmental puzzles, discuss some familiar issues and uncover secrets shaping the journey toward balance.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into a dream world. Become the sole source of light in the darkness and Explore an authentic handcrafted landscape in third-person. Solve layered environmental puzzles, discuss some familiar issues and uncover secrets shaping the journey toward balance.
